function EP02_06()

    --.起-5【4月第1週】「姫ギャル・鬼灯リラ」
    SaveData.Title = "姫ギャル・鬼灯リラ"

    --//BG：学食
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    MSG([[ After the opening ceremony, we first-year A-class students visited the school cafeteria for a social gathering. ]])

    MSG([[ Perhaps because it was ending at noon today, it seemed quite empty, and it looked like everyone in the class could find a seat. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025ae")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ We each chose our favorite orders and sat around a long central table. ]])

    MSG([[ Then I suddenly noticed something. ]])
    --//BU：ヒユ（悲しみ）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-375,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,375,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah, um? Is everyone ordering the Vegetable Extra Chicken Set Meal?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ In front of every student sitting around the table, the same dish I had was placed. ]])

    MSG([[ It was a dish that stood out on the menu, characterized by a heaping pile of bean sprouts, cabbage, and mushrooms on an iron plate. ]])

    MSG([[ In reality, it was more like a mountain than just vegetables. There should have been chicken, but it was buried under the mountain and invisible. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//CI：ヤサイマシマシに喜ぶ雑エリカ、絶望する雑ヒユ 020
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI020a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    --LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    --LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
    --LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

    MSG([[ I was excited thinking I could finally eat a hearty meal after a long time, my heart and stomach dancing with joy, but the sight of that mountain lining the edge of the table looked like some kind of ritual. ]])

    MSG([[ I had forgotten that I was cross-dressing when I ordered it, but isn’t it tough for the others…? ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",0,false)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,1000,Ease.Linear)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(1000)
--LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Y-You all eat a lot too, don’t you?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0098.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Normally, we can’t eat this much! But I want to eat the same thing as my sister, that’s all!” ]])

    MSG([[ The classmates all nodded vigorously at Hiyu’s words. So, they deliberately ordered the same menu as me? ]])

    MSG([[ Looking closely, everyone seemed a bit anxious, and their hands holding chopsticks were trembling. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0099.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “It’s not just us! Look around!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Wha!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    --//CI：マウンテンだらけの食堂 021
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI021a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask013",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Looking around, Vegetable Extra Mountains had formed in various places throughout the cafeteria. ]])

    MSG([[ There are so many people who want to eat the same meal as me…? Just being chosen as a candidate for ‘Princess’ has this much influence. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask014",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Feeling once again the power of the title ‘Princess,’ I decided to eat before it got cold. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Let’s eat.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I dug my chopsticks into the piled-up vegetables. ]])

    MSG([[ Mmm. The miso flavor was well absorbed, and the spicy kick added a nice accent, making it delicious. ]])

    MSG([[ The crunchy texture was satisfying, and I felt like I could eat a lot. ]])

    MSG([[ The chicken was small in quantity but had a strong presence due to the rich red miso seasoning, perfectly matching the rice. ]])

    MSG([[ Not only did it have a visual impact, but it was also solid as a dish. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (The lingering umami and spiciness must be from a strong touch of doubanjiang, huh? I’ll try making it myself sometime.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0100.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Whoa… Sis, your appetite is amazing.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Eh!? Ah, y-yeah! I was really hungry! Ahaha…” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I forgot that I was a girl and quickly finished eating. This is probably a bit off-putting. ]])

    MSG([[ However. ]])
    --//BU：ヒユ（驚き）、モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0101.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “To be able to eat that much and keep such a great figure… As expected, Erika Sis is a superhuman.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 “The newspaper club’s story about you living abroad before was true!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 “This amount of food and your innocent aura… it all adds up if you’re a returnee!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 “A slightly airheaded returnee… wonderful~~~” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Nobody was put off at all. Rather, they conveniently interpreted it favorably. ]])

    MSG([[ My chest hurt with guilt but I was somewhat relieved. Maybe because I’ve gotten used to it, I’m a bit careless, so I have to be more careful... ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I thought that, I was forced to straighten my resolve. ]])

    STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ It started when a piercing scream came from beyond the cafeteria entrance. ]])

    MSG([[ The voice grew louder, and confusion rippled through the cafeteria air. ]])

    MSG([[ From such a commotion, it was undoubtedly a ‘Princess’-level student approaching. ]])

    MSG([[ It wasn’t Uran from this ruckus. Hermes was also busy and rarely appeared at school. ]])

    MSG([[ Could it be Daria...? ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu and the knights noticed the shift in atmosphere, stopped eating, and cautiously watched the cafeteria entrance. ]])

    --//SE：黄色い悲鳴・中断
STOP_SE("SEf008.wav")

    MSG([[ The cafeteria fell completely silent. That silence was shattered by a powerful shout— ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

    --//CI：リラBU（真剣）口元切り抜き 022
LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG025aa")
LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
LAYER_POSITION(200,950,0)
LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR01ba")
LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
LAYER_POSITION(201,0,300)
SET_CUTIN_07_XL(100, 60, 35, 500, true)
RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR01ba", 300, 300)
RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 “Bow your heads, weeds.” ]])

    MSG([[ The sudden command echoed through the cafeteria— ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav",0)

RESET_CUTIN_07_01(500)
RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

    --//CＩ：CG『リラ登場』の土下座部分切り抜き
--LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI023a")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
PLAY_SE("SEa033.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI017a")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,0,300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Everyone around me promptly dropped to their knees in a deep bow. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-250)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-150,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0102.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Guh… guhh…” ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu pressed her face to the table with a strained expression. I didn’t understand what was happening at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Amidst so many students bowing, a girl with golden hair stepped into the cafeteria. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//CG：鬼灯リラ登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 “What a spectacle~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Weeds truly belong on the ground, huh.” ]])
    --//リラ

    MSG([[ Seeing her, I was sure she was the cause of the earlier commotion. ]])

    MSG([[ Voluminous eyelashes, vivid eyes, dewy smooth cheeks. Her vivid yet natural beautiful makeup caught the eye. ]])

    MSG([[ Most striking was her fashion. No blazer, a hoodie tied around her waist, rolled-up sleeves held with a safety pin on the right and a badge on the left, asymmetrically styled. ]])

    MSG([[ Even at Yuriai Private Academy, where uniform modifications are free, no one else wore theirs this uniquely. ]])
    --//BG：食堂
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG025aa")
    --//BU：ヒユ（焦り）、リラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01aa")
    　LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0103.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “H-Hoozuki-san! What do you want with Erika Sis!? Are you spying on the fellow ‘Princess’ candidate!?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 “Nothing in particular? Coming to lunch at the cafeteria is natural, right? As a ‘Princess’ candidate, I want to know all the school’s facilities.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Ah, you’re also a ‘Princess’ candidate?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025ae")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Yup. I’m Lira Hoozuki~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Nice to meet ya~” ]])


    MSG([[ Lira sat beside me and took a sip of my half-finished water. I-Inherited indirect kiss… ]])

    MSG([[ Though casual, there was an unsettling air about her. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Well, since we’re candidates, let’s get along from now on. I just came by to say hello today.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “No need to be so guarded, it’s all good, all good~” ]])

PLAY_SE("SEa024.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Lira smiled, placed her hand on my shoulder, and then— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0055.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Kneel down, newbie.” ]])

    MSG([[ She whispered words clearly laced with hostility. ]])

    --//efect：フラッシュ
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",50,false)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BG000ab")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(80,0,800,Ease.InCubic)
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ I felt dizzy like when I locked eyes with Daria-san, but this time I managed to withstand it. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira must have done something to me. Glad I was on guard. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0056.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Heh.” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,900,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,400,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(500)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0104.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Hyuaahhh!!! Move away from Sis!!!” ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu rushed at Lira in a great fury, but Lira dodged swiftly. ]])

    MSG([[ Her face held an amused smile as if expecting something. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Be careful, Erika Sis! Hoozuki-san is a born queen!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “When she whispers something, your body can’t help but obey her orders!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “She was feared as the ‘Princess Gal’ since middle school and is the most famous beautiful girl among new students!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “S-She can make you obey her orders!?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ So that’s why everyone hurried into deep bows. Indeed, Lira’s whispered words hit my brain like a thud and felt hard to refuse. ]])

    MSG([[ Not just her looks and voice, her confident presence might be overwhelming. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0057.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Thanks for the clear explanation, Hiyu~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> You’re just as crazy about beautiful girls as always.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “I-I'm not just some beautiful-girl fan~~~~!?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Please don’t praise me.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “Are you praising her, though?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Still, forcibly making others obey orders — she was equally extraordinary as Daria and Uran. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined I’d be competing for the ‘Princess’ seat with someone like this... ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0058.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “If you’re the kind of weed who obeys my words, there’s no competition. But you’re pretty good.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ia")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0059.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Alright, Erika. I’ll recognize you as my rival.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Lira said that and spun on her heel. Speaking with her back to me— ]])

    --//BU無し
    --//CI： 022
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG025aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200,7)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,950,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,345)
    SET_CUTIN_01_M(273, 500)

-- WAIT(1000)
-- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",0,false)
-- LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,400,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
-- LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
-- WAIT(1000)
-- LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ba")
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “But at the next election, the ‘Princess’ will be me, Lira Hoozuki. I won’t lose to you. No way.” ]])

    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    -- LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    -- LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-400,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    -- WAIT(500)

    RESET_CUTIN_01(273,500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Oh, everyone, you can raise your heads now. Well then, byebye <sprite="Emoji" name="star">” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ When Lira left the cafeteria in her light tone, all the students who had been bowing raised their faces and breathed out in relief. ]])

    MSG([[ Just by Lira leaving, the atmosphere changed as if surfacing from underwater. ]])

    MSG([[ A beautiful girl who alone changes the atmosphere of the scene. Truly a presence worthy of the title ‘Princess.’ ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Do I, a guy, even have a chance?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My legs began trembling all of a sudden. Seeking courage, as usual, I touched the pendant on my chest to ask my sister for help. ]])

    MSG([[ And, as usual, there was no reply from her. Since it’s a problem I have to handle myself, that’s only natural. ]])

    MSG([[ To solidify my resolve from now on, I clenched my fist tightly.]])
    --　　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_07")
end
